function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential transmission of SARS-CoV-2 via feces in wastewater","Impact":"Increased risk of environmental contamination and transmission","Mitigation":"Implementation of advanced wastewater treatment technologies, regular monitoring of wastewater for viral RNA, and public health education on proper sanitation practices","Technologies":"Advanced wastewater treatment technologies, wastewater-based epidemiology (WBE)","People":"General population, wastewater treatment workers","Owner":"Public health authorities, wastewater treatment facilities"},{"Description":"Inaccurate estimation of infection spread in a population","Impact":"Misguided public health measures and resource allocation","Mitigation":"Enhanced testing capabilities, improved data collection and analysis, and collaboration between healthcare institutions and research organizations","Technologies":"Advanced testing methods, data analytics, and collaborative research platforms","People":"Public health authorities, healthcare institutions, research organizations","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, research organizations"},{"Description":"Delayed detection of non-detected COVID-19 cases","Impact":"Increased risk of undetected transmission and higher infection rates","Mitigation":"Enhanced testing protocols, improved surveillance systems, and public health communication on early detection of symptoms","Technologies":"Rapid testing kits, surveillance systems, and public health communication tools","People":"General population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Public health authorities, healthcare institutions"}]}
